Templates.template:
new sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)
		blocked: ${bBlocked}, // boolean
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: [${fieldGroupIds}], // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		cssClass: "${cssClass}", // string
		searchTerm: ${""}, // string
		searchOnStart: ${bSearchOnStart}, // boolean
		filterRootCondition: ${filterRootCondition}, // object
		sinaConfiguration: ${sinaConfiguration}, // object
		dataSource: "${dataSource}", // string
		exclusiveDataSource: "${exclusiveDataSource}", // string
		resultViewTypes: ${[]}, // string[]
		resultViewType: ${"searchResultList"}, // string
		resultViewSettings: ${"...see text or source"}, // string
		tabStripsFormatter: ${fn_tabStripsFormatter}, // function
		folderMode: ${bFolderMode}, // boolean
		folderModeForInitialSearch: ${bFolderModeForInitialSearch}, // boolean
		autoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode: ${bAutoAdjustResultViewTypeInFolderMode}, // boolean
		enableQueryLanguage: ${bEnableQueryLanguage}, // boolean
		applicationComponent: ${"HAN-AS-INA-UI"}, // string
		facetPanelResizable: ${bFacetPanelResizable}, // boolean
		facetPanelWidthInPercent: ${25}, // float
		getCustomNoResultScreen: ${fn_getCustomNoResultScreen}, // function
		getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel: ${fn_getSearchInputPlaceholderLabel}, // function
		overwriteBrowserTitle: ${bOverwriteBrowserTitle}, // boolean
		defaultDataSource: "${defaultDataSource}", // string
		optimizeForValueHelp: ${bOptimizeForValueHelp}, // boolean
		filterDataSources: ${fn_filterDataSources}, // function
		facetVisibility: ${bFacetVisibility}, // boolean
		boSuggestions: ${bBoSuggestions}, // boolean
		displayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults: ${bDisplayFacetPanelInCaseOfNoResults}, // boolean
		updateUrl: ${bUpdateUrl}, // boolean
		renderSearchUrl: ${fn_renderSearchUrl}, // function
		isSearchUrl: ${fn_isSearchUrl}, // function
		parseSearchUrlParameters: ${fn_parseSearchUrlParameters}, // function
		quickSelectDataSources: ${quickSelectDataSources}, // object
		selectionChange: ${fn_selectionChange}, // function
		initAsync: ${fn_initAsync}, // function
		enableMultiSelectionResultItems: ${bEnableMultiSelectionResultItems}, // boolean
		pageSize: ${10}, // int
		formatFilterBarText: ${fn_formatFilterBarText}, // function
		isFilterBarVisible: ${fn_isFilterBarVisible}, // function
		eventConsumers: "${eventConsumers}", // string
		searchTermLengthLimit: ${1000}, // int
		limitAjaxRequests: ${bLimitAjaxRequests}, // boolean
		content: [${content}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		searchStarted: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		searchFinished: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		selectionChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		resultViewTypeChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription: Constructs a new SearchCompositeControl to interact with SAP Enterprise Search Services.
Templates.name: sap.esh.search.ui.SearchCompositeControl
Templates.helpDescription: This is the SAPUI5 composite control by the Enterprise Search Team which helps to make full use of the Enterprise Search Engine features built into ABAP and HANA. It includes a search input box including a suggestion dropdown, a result view which can have different visualisation, including tiles, list and table, filtering facets and more. This control is ready to use with an enterprise search backend service but also allows deep extension to match requirements of adopting applications.
